channel.title: SpaCy on Erik Tuck - Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in SpaCy on Erik Tuck - Portfolio

item.title: Using NLP with Twitter to monitor natural disasters
item.description: When disaster strikes, real-time social media monitoring can be a powerful tool for early warning and response. This project analyzes Twitter data to identify posts that describe actual natural disasters, which could potentially serve as an early warning system for governmental and humanitarian organizations.

item.title: News topic modeling with matrix factorization
item.description: A comparative analysis of unsupervised and supervised machine learning techniques for classifying news articles into predefined categories
